title: The new Shonen Anime Skins (leak, just click if you want to know!)
body:
So it seems that there was a bug on the PBE, putting the title of a new skin in the shop there and this is definitely going to be the new Shonen Anime skin line! [](https://pm1.narvii.com/6858/509ae0a7b230309fa7c8e4c66c921bfa86a0dc49v2_hq.jpg)

The name of the new skin line: **Battle Academia**
https://cdn.polscygracze.pl/uploads/2019/03/Battle_Academia_Jayce.jpg

So it seems we really get a school based skin line with different clubs fighting each other perhaps. The skin for the engineer club is most likely going to Jayce!
{{champion:126}} 

So we just have to think now: Who is going to become the teacher? And who represents the other clubs, being battle, assassination, and sorcerer?

There was a recent leak in reddit that was taken down, and Jayce was actually in the battle club, not the engineer club. Viktor was in the engineer club instead.

Edit: just to clarify, the leak used the same "battle academia" terminology, so it's most probably true.

Just looked it up what you mean (I saw that leak too).

And it got taken down because it seems there has been evidence that it was indeed a fake leak.
Additionally, it used the battle academia terminology, but as far as I know, this list got posted _after_ the bug on PBE happened. So this is definitely not an evidence that the list is true.

there is also a supposed leak on the jhinmain page that ties in with this and gives away a lot of [other skins](https://www.reddit.com/r/JhinMains/comments/b4xsr5/new_skins_leaked/)

To be completely honest with you: I highly doubt this leak. Seems more like someone saw the bug on the PBE with the new Jayce skin and is using it to make their leak seem more believable.

What mostly throws me off here is that basically he is saying that Jayce would represent the Battle Club, then Viktor represents the Engineer Club.
Jayce as a champion is way too engineer-y to not be the engineer club, it seems weird. 

And the names he has chosen "Battle Academia, Engineer Academia...." lets it sound like these are all different schools fighting each other. But the teaser said "Battle **Club**, Engineer **Club**" which sounds more like they are all members of the same school, but representing different clubs with different foci there. I think they will all share the name "Battle Academy", since they go to the same school, but still represent different clubs. I don't think every skin gets an unique name.

And if I am not mistaken (English isn't my first language), then sorcery is spelled wrongly there? ^^

I see Professor Ryze in the Academy skin line. If the Academy skin line and this new Battle Academy skin line are related in their lore universe, then I can imagine that.

They said they want to do more like what they did to High Noon, alternating existing skin lines in other ways. And since the names Academy and Battle Academy are so close, it is not unlikely that they are doing it here and these 2 skin lines in fact represent the same skin universe.

___________________________

That being said: If it ends up this way, then Professor Ryze wouldn't end up in the Sorcerer Club. There was another tag called "Teacher" in the teaser, since he is called **Professor** Ryze, he definitely has to end up in that Teacher tag.
